website_summaries.verdict: An advent calendar full of LEGO Friends fun with a new item to build every day.
pros: Every day features a new item to build, including a snowman, hamster sleigh, train, and tiara
Each day's door shows a photo of the finished project so kids can see how the pieces are supposed to go together
cons: Some buyers got calendars where the LEGO pieces didn't match the photo inside the door

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for an advent calendar, but no directions included.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived earlier than expected and is awesome, I know my daughter is going to love it! However, there are no directions for the builds.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker10071

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for those days leading up to Christmas! Gives children an entertaining way to count the days!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Always a hit, wish the build scene was like years past.
customer_reviews.text: We buy these every year. The only issue with this exact set is that LEGO didn’t include a “scene” to build on. Normally the flap opens to an ice rink or similar snow scene to build each day and create a little scene. The other ones we bought (Harry Potter and LEGO city and Star Wars) still did this. The child that received this one just covered the flap with white felt in her own. Hope LEGO goes back to regular scene design next year.
customer_reviews.author: GreatCates

customer_reviews.title: Lego figures don't match the numbers
customer_reviews.text: We opened this Advent calendar today (Dec. 1st) and realized that the contents of the package for today didn't match the number. I did eventually find the correct figure after pulling out the entire box, but many of the figures have similar colored bricks so what was supposed to be in #1 wasn't easy to find. It isn't clear at this point if all of the packages are there, or if we are missing some. This is a big disappointment since it really ruins the advent calendar experience. We have bought these in the past and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Taupier

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old loves this! Her older brother and I help her put them together. I feel like the price for the amount of figures you get is pretty good. Legos aren't cheap! My only complaint is that a few of the things you build are so odd-looking, I really have no idea what they're supposed to be! I got my son the regular Advent (not the friends one), and I like it better because it has more recognizable Christmas figures/ scenes. Overall pleased though, and my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have been loving this advent calendar! My daughter is 4 (almost 5) & she loves lego friends. She needs helping building everything, but that's part of the fun each morning. She has a tiny tree in her room, we've been stringing her new ornaments on. HIGHLY recommend this calendar if you know someone who loves legos and decorating for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cheek

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. I cannot wait to give it to my daughter when December starts for Advent. She is obsessed with LEGO’s and can use the ornaments to decorate her teeny tree.
customer_reviews.author: MinneapolisVinylRind

customer_reviews.title: pre christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I give my grandkids every year an Adventkalendar. My 6 year old grand daughter liked but I am not happy that there was no scenery to put the assembled pieced together. All the ones I bought for them had a nice presentation surface/stand (even if it is part of the cardboard box), so that the child could display the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tiny parts
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat, but I bought them for a three-year-old and the parts are way too small for him. There's 1 million tiny pieces, more than is even required to build the thing, so we ended up with a cup full of extra parts and I had to hide everything from him as soon as they were built because he takes them right apart. Would definitely be cool for an older kid
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bainter

customer_reviews.title: Great set with unique Lego pieces
customer_reviews.text: Each daily set has a little hook bar piece to tie a string or attach an ornament hook to. We bought a $3 mini tree from the Target bullseye area and hung all the Lego ornaments on it. The daily sets are fun and creative, easy to build, each door flap has a picture of the final item. Most days have an extra piece in case one is lost. There are lots of unique shaped, special pieces in this calendar, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves waking up to build a small Xmas LEGO. Only thing is that some are a little lame. Yet some are way cool. We enjoy waking up to opening this every morning. They even have a hook holder on each one. So we bough a small tree for the kitchen table and place them like ornaments on our little tree.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Donohue

customer_reviews.title: very happy nephew and niece
customer_reviews.text: My niece and nephew absolutely LOVED these - they brought hours of fun and daily excitement. Well worth the price! I paid $20 for each of these 2 which I bought and I saw that they were retailing for much more at Target and other brick and mortar locations so I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Clare Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My child gets so excited to open the new days’ door every morning! Very cute pieces. My four year old can do most of them although the pieces are small. I wasn’t sure we were doing them correctly at first until I realized they give you extra pieces every day. We will likely buy another set again next year.
customer_reviews.author: D_12

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: This set was just ok. Compared to the LEGO City advent calendar, this one was a little weird. It only had 1 LEGO person in it and then just kind of a bunch of random things we really didn’t know what they were. Next year, I’ll get my daughter the LEGO city one.
customer_reviews.author: KTri

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is really disappointed with this set so far. It’s really not a Christmas set as much as a hodgepodge of toys. We’ve been doing a Lego advent calendar for many years, and this is the weakest set. There’s no build up to the biggest day.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to give these to our girls. They just loved them last year!
customer_reviews.author: Jennine Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young children.
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loved this! She’s four and was able to easily follow the instructions and assemble each piece. She felt so special, being able to open a “new” gift each day. It was fun to be a part of teaching her about patience as she asked me multiple times if she could just open them all at once 😂
customer_reviews.author: jnnylrnz

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone who loves LEGOs
customer_reviews.text: The LEGO advent calendars are a favorite for my nieces. I would recommend for the holidays to Anyone with kids who love legos. My nieces can’t wait to get to open their calendar and see what they get each day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This is our second year doing these. Only complaint is there is only one “friend”. The city Verizon has 3-4 LEGO people and my daughter is jealous that her brother got more! But over all they are really fun designs. We love legos
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Young

customer_reviews.title: Gave one to each of the grandkids.
customer_reviews.text: Gave one to a little boy last year and he enjoyed putting the little lego item together everyday. Bought 3 this year and small trees to hang the legos on. They will get them right after Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: hllbllr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when you can’t have chocolate
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these one for our 8 and one for our 5 year old. The 5 year old learned so much and the 8 year old really like Learning what all the specialty pieces can be used. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent calendar for Lego lovers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with Lego Friends and she absolutely loved this advent calendar. She loved seeing what new surprise each day will bring. Very cute, well made, easy to put together given there are no actual directions. Great price too. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Valerya Couto

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old daughter loves this LEGO event calendar. She can even assemble each one on her own. She gets so excited for each day to come so she can open a day up and add to her collection. Perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Molnar/Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it was like the regular LEGO advent calendar, with fun Christmas-y LEGO pieces. This is rather boring, half the things my child doesn’t even know what they are & she got the same thing 2 days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Girl Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the mini projects and that they had handles to use as ornaments. Some days even included doubles to share with friends/family. There were always extra pieces and never any missing.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great!! But needs display
customer_reviews.text: It was totally adorable! My daughter loved, but I wish it came with some type of Lego 'plate' to attach all the creations. I know you can buy them separately, but the calendar would have been PERFECT if it came with some type of way to display everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rae Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lego Advent Calendars!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 2019 Lego Friends Advent Calendar for my 6 year old granddaughter and the 2019 Lego City Advent Calendar for my 7 year old grandson and they are having a blast with them! They are so excited to open each day's little "door" and see what's inside. They are not hard to build (some a little more challenging than others), and average about 8 to 12 pieces for each. Absolutely love them and will definitely buy next year's 2020 calendar!
customer_reviews.author: burger400

customer_reviews.title: It isn't built right if there aren't leftover pieces
customer_reviews.text: Our elf, "Dolly", brought this to our daughter to kick off the season. We are counting down and on day 12. Some of the pictoral directions are a little difficult to make out and almost all of the sets have had extra pieces left over.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Madden

customer_reviews.title: All ornaments.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed the whole thing was ornaments. I should have looked more closely at the details. My 4 year old is enjoying it. I just wish it can work more fun stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bryant

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Friends Advent calendar is great again this year
customer_reviews.text: The 2018 & 2019 Friends advent calendar have been small ornaments. My stepdaughter has really enjoyed doing these and putting them on her own small Christmas tree. I highly recommend these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Cute and festive.
customer_reviews.text: So cute and fun to open every day. I could imagine this being fun for all ages. Got this for my 5 year old girl; 2.5 year old girl and 7 year old boy enjoyed opening and assembling.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Not so fond of the different sizes. Not a cohesive set like Playmobil one I got for the little one. My 7.5 years ended up loving the Playmobil advent calendar I got for her little sister much more.
customer_reviews.author: Bubu

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids that love legos.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but very small parts and miniMap instructions. My 8 year old got frustrated with it early on. I guess her problem is that she doesn’t LOVE LEGO’s.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lego gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has issues with small motor control and this has been the perfect gift. The projects are small and she can quickly put them together by herself. This has helped in her self esteem and she beams each evening when she is finished. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: teach054

customer_reviews.title: Neat advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My girls just love these Lego advent calendars. This years was neat as it gives you little ornaments to make and hang on their own little mini tree. Good price. Has extras to add to collection. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Gypsy Decor

customer_reviews.title: Shipping sucks
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but the shipping was horrible. It took amazon weeks to deliver this, which nearly rendered it, as a calendar, worthless.
customer_reviews.author: tayloao

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift this season!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was thrilled with her Lego christmas countdown gift! She looked forward to every morning so she could open the next door!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old daughter loves this. The daily small items have been fun for her to assemble. She says that she would like more people, only one so far after 20 days, but still overall she has enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: THIS ADVENT CALENDAR WAS A "VERY BIG MISTAKE" AND WILL "NOT BE REPEATED"......DISGUSTING!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Granddaughter just received this LEGO Advent Calendar in the mail in time to do a "countdown to Christmas" by opening each date to a surprise; OR SO I THOUGHT. ALL SHE RECEIVED WAS A BOX OF LEGGO'S FIGURES AND THAT WAS IT!!!!! IS THIS HOW THIS "CALENDAR" IS SUPPOSED TO SHOW EACH TOY?????????????........DISGUSTED BY THIS "ADVANT CALENDAR" B.S. WOULD BE PUTTING IT MILDLY......Mrs. Wilma L. Hunter
customer_reviews.author: Wilma H.p

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is adorable. My daughter looked forward to it every day and at the end had a cute little set to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mull

customer_reviews.title: Efficient way to get unique legos
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty cute advent calendar that makes my daughter happy. Only thing to note is that unlike a “boy” version this one opens up and lacks a scene for the pieces to lay on. Pictures included for clarification.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun, had a blast doing these with a 4yo and 6yo. Extra peices included in each one as well, which was great!
customer_reviews.author: Happy2BeReading

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids enjoyed this very much. It provided two boys (3 and 6) much entertainment! They were surprised at how many legos we’re actually included. Enough for both boys in one pack.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo daughter loved this. A new LEGO to build each day and she could keep track of how many days until Christmas instead of asking me. Probably a little overpriced for the number of pieces but it’s cute and a fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: My
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE opening the calendar each night. I have three girls age 4-15 and they all love LEGO’s. They take turns. Wish there were better instructions for how to build each item and wish they weren’t so expensive so I could buy 3 but I know LEGO’s in general are pricy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Not as fun as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but, it only comes with 1 lego friend, the other calendars come with 5 or 6. Also many of the items you build are too big for the doll to use. They are supposed to be little ornaments. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: Fun calendar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so excited to open the new door every day. They are easy to build and the directions on the door are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Legos. I gave him this December 1st and he loves assembling the different Legos daily. Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: JaniceP

customer_reviews.title: When it’s over, there isn’t that much...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoyed this but once everything was opened and put together there just wasn’t much. It was more of a novelty than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter ran right to her advent calendar every morning before she did anything else. This was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Extra pieces
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old enjoyed opening up a new compartment every morning. Each character or item came with extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: kmiller

customer_reviews.title: 7-9 years old - still loves it
customer_reviews.text: We get the new lego friends advent every year, my daughter loves that there is an option to hang them from her mini tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A yearly tradition for us.
customer_reviews.text: We get one of these for each of our children every year. They absolutely love them! They look forward to building the kits every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Extra pieces, great quality, FUN!
customer_reviews.text: We love these advent calendars! Having a girlier themed one has been super fun for both our son and daughter!
customer_reviews.author: sweetmama34

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the flaps were so flimsy and that there were not dedicated separators between the days. It was also not in chronological order, but that's not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Arneecher

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old loved this advent calendar. We like to have these as opposed to the chocolate ones. She was excited every day to open a new slot. Pieces were easy to build and can be ornaments on a tree. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: Excited LEGO Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the first year that we are doing Advent Calendars with our kids and they are very excited! I cannot wait to have my daughter get to experience her first Advent calendar with some of her favorite LEGO characters.
customer_reviews.author: CPSanti

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for LEGO lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old daughter loved the LEGO Friends one. She looked forward to opening it everyday. I will definitely purchase a different one again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 Lego friend comes in it
customer_reviews.text: It only comes with 1 Lego friend. I didn’t like that, I have gotten Lego City for my son and it comes with a few people. Some unique builds, still confused on a few. Overall my daughter likes it so it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Adored by my 6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter has been so excited to get out of bed every morning (and she’s NOT a morning person!) to open the Lego for the day. They’re really cute designs and easy for her to do on her own. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jenrette

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar.  Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great idea for the lego lover in your life. I love that it's not just figures every day either-You're getting the pieces to assemble little Christmas items too!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Holiday tradition
customer_reviews.text: This is a new holiday tradition for our kids. My daughter loves building each day and placing them on the tree!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kroese

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other years, this calendar has much smaller ornaments. There is much less detail and while still cute, does not compare to other years.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Tis the Season for Advent! Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product and advent calendar! My daughter wakes each morning anxious to build the figure. I would recommend to anyone. For LEGO.....I purchased four of these. The FRIENDS one is the only design where the flap doesn’t provide a platform to build/grow the Christmas scene. I hope they change this design for the future. I included two pictures, one of FRIENDS and one of the CITY for an example.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this one but lost interest because it was very girly. I liked it though!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Healey

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great advent calendar. My 11 year old has really enjoyed this set and looks forward to opening each day. She has a tree in her room and has used the ornaments on it.
customer_reviews.author: momoffive

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old not into it.
customer_reviews.text: Ehh.. my 5 year old wasn't that into it. Not easy eniugh to assemble the small stuff
customer_reviews.author: TBR

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Still working through it during this advent season. Have loved all the daily builds!
customer_reviews.author: Eden Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my daughters advent calendar. It had the cutest little penguins and snowman so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas countdown!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love being able to count down to Christmas. Gave it to them on thanksgiving so they’d have it on dec 1 to start opening.
customer_reviews.author: crystal s

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: They lost interest after the 5th day The items didn’t interact with each other
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis S.

customer_reviews.title: Legos!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves loves loves this. He is excited every morning. Picture of what it should make is on the door, no directions though. Great price maybe for kids aged 7+
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne pierce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to kick off the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters request these every year before the holidays! Perfect for ages 6 and up!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Menapace

customer_reviews.title: Pictures for each day don't match the pieces
customer_reviews.text: We got the Lego City one for our son and Lego Friends for our daughter. His is great! Hers would be great, but the pictures for each day don't match the pieces that come with that day. The first day we guessed on how to assemble the pieces. The second day we opened same issue, and ended up having to look online to see what it should be. Very disappointed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Levy

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t opened it yet but if it’s anything like last year my daughter is going to love it. I buy new ones every year for my kids because they get so excited for them.
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Cute advent calendar for LEGO fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter. I’ll be gifting it to her on Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, only one mini figure and the other items are small and hokey.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingShell

customer_reviews.title: Would grandkids like it?
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to our grandkids. They love legos, so they were excited to open one every day. Easy to assemble and cute little LEGO objects.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Not my fave Lego product
customer_reviews.text: Cute but hard to figure out the instructions. The figures are flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved opening the small box each morning and putting the LEGO ornaments together. Great product. Loved the pictures included this year showing what the item was.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I get one of these every year for my daughter. This One is great, as always.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and looks forward to opening each one daily
customer_reviews.author: motoxracer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the nieces and nephews before Christmas! I’ll do this every year!
customer_reviews.author: TFrost

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent option!
customer_reviews.text: My 6.5 year old daughter looked forward every day to finding out what was in the calender. She was able to assemble the toy on her own. It was easy enough and just challenging enough. It is our seceond year getting a Lego advent calander. Will get one again next year. Plus they all look so cute hanging on a little tree.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Linkemyer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my 8 year old. She loves opening one every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good set, but only one minifig
customer_reviews.text: Decent set, down size you only get one minifig. Daughter love it though.
customer_reviews.author: kyle wachter

customer_reviews.title: Great for
customer_reviews.text: Thought was good price then found cheaper elsewhere closer to December 1.
customer_reviews.author: TigerFan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that we could have an advent calendar of something that my daughter loves (instead of chocolate). Easy to open and build each day!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Fun advent LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun! My daughter has enjoyed doing this every night for advent!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Balogh

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cute buildables
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is fun for both my son and daughter and some spaces even have multiple builds.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very cute calendar for my son who loves legos wish some of the items had been more recognizable thought
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Hernandez-Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Fun holiday addition
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved this advent calendar. The daily lego sets are easy to put together. My almost 6 year old could do them on her own and my 4 year old with a little help. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Goehring

customer_reviews.title: Repeats from 2018
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves to make these ornaments but there were a lot of repeats (very similar) from the previous year.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter who is 5. She has enjoyed opening each day and putting the figures together.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Womack

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun calendar! A little build for every day.
customer_reviews.author: indygal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome calendar
customer_reviews.text: Way better for kids than the chocolate version! Grandkids loved getting. A new LEGO toy every day
customer_reviews.author: Rita Main

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fun. I wouldn't spend $40-$50 on it but definitely worth $25 (if you can catch it on sale).
customer_reviews.author: AlissH

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She made the ornaments every morning. We even had a small tree that she was able to decorate with all the ornaments. My favorite was the sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Looking for more Christmas-y than this, but still good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, some of the assembled items weren’t very Christmas-y. But overall would likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: I love these yearly gifts from me to me.
customer_reviews.text: I love my yearly Advent calendars. This year's they made them so you can actually hang them WOOT WOOT!
customer_reviews.author: Cherise Fitzgerald

product_meta.title: LEGO Friends Advent Calendar 41382 Building Kit (330 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Help your little builder get ready for Christmas with the LEGO Friends 41382 Advent Calendar. Slowly build the Christmas countdown for kids by letting them open a new door each day. Behind the 24 doors of this holiday advent calendar are cool, buildable gifts representing the world of Heartlake City. They will add festive cheer when displayed in the bedroom or, once tied with a ribbon, hanging on the tree. Includes a Mia mini-doll, plus 2 penguins and 2 robot, a hamster and snowman figures
feature_bullets: Build the excitement to Christmas by giving this advent calendar, and help your little one construct the 24 surprises!
This toy advent calendar includes a Mia mini-doll figure, plus 2 robot figures, a snowman, 2 penguins and hamster figures
330 pieces – For boys and girls aged 6+ and for fans and kids of all ages
